lst.name: sentence
lst.str: However, they noted that although sterling had edged down from its highs following the base rate cut, it had still closed on a trade-weighted basis at 72.4, well ahead of Friday's final 71.8 and only just beneath the peak of 72.5 touched at 1300 GMT.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: K. Budget on March 17, thereby preserving the full impact of Chancellor of the Exchequer Nigel Lawson's package of measures.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: To the surprise of most participants, the issue was sold out within hours of becoming available for trading and the market pushed on to register further sharp gains.
